name: Force Maneuvering
description: Advanced tactics for positioning and movement of military forces to gain strategic advantage.

cards.title: Flanking and Encirclement Tactics
cards.description: Using positioning to neutralize enemy forces through flanking and encirclement.
cards.bulletpoints: Pincer movements, hammer-and-anvil tactics, blitzkrieg strategies

cards.title: Rapid Deployment and Mobility
cards.description: Utilizing speed and terrain for effective force deployment.
cards.bulletpoints: Airborne insertions, mechanized warfare, strategic positioning
